original_title: At the Foot of the Rainbow
overview: Fifteen years ago 1830s muskrat trapper Dannie Mcnoun, loves Mary and sends his best friend, Jimmy, to win her over for Dannie. Jimmy married her instead. Now neighbors, Dannie works both farms as Jimmy tries to drown his problems with a bottle.
tagline: How much would you do for your best friend?
title: At the Foot of the Rainbow
